Name: Image.Glow
Desc: Adds a glow effect to bright areas of the image.
LongDesc: The Glow method detects bright regions in the image and applies a blurred, colored glow to them. It supports threshold, blur radius, intensity, color tint, and blend mode. Useful for artistic highlights and simulating light effects.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Glow({ blurRadius: 20, intensity: 1.5 }); });
